data.message: I'd rather be able to have a complete cover pic, without my name and profile plastered all over it.

replies.message: Hey Lori. We're sorry to hear you're not liking the new design. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us ensure that we're providing the best possible experience for everyone. Please let us know what you would change about it here: http://on.fb.me/1xXidyw -Ryan
Just as it use to be. The cover pic was open. And the profile pic and name where below it.  And I use my phone often on FB. Where and how do I hide my friends list? Thank you for your reply.
